mapper.insert: insert into OA_SUB_BUSINESS_CONFIG( id, business_config_id, sub_event_code, sub_event_code_name, target, customer_id, value, from_value, to_value, unit, memo, gmt_create, gmt_modified, operator, last_modified_oeprator ) values ( #{id}, #{businessConfigId}, #{subEventCode}, #{subEventCodeName}, #{target}, #{customerId}, #{value}, #{fromValue}, #{toValue}, #{unit}, #{memo}, now(), now(), #{operator}, #{lastModifiedOperator} )
mapper.select: select id , business_config_id , sub_event_code , sub_event_code_name , target , customer_id , value , from_value , to_value , unit , memo , orders , gmt_create , gmt_modified , operator , last_modified_oeprator from OA_SUB_BUSINESS_CONFIG where business_config_id=#{mainConfigId} order by orders asc

and subConfig.customer_id=#{customerId}
